code: @Test public void testMinaRoute() throws Exception {     MockEndpoint endpoint = getMockEndpoint("mock:result").     Object body = "Hello there!".     endpoint.expectedBodiesReceived(body).     template.sendBodyAndHeader(String.format("mina2:tcp://localhost:%1$s?textline=true&sync=false", getPort()), body, "cheese", 123).     assertMockEndpointsSatisfied(). }

protected RouteBuilder createRouteBuilder() {     return new RouteBuilder() {          public void configure() {             from(String.format("mina2:tcp://localhost:%1$s?textline=true&sync=false", getPort())).to("log:before?showAll=true").to("mock:result").to("log:after?showAll=true").         }     }. }
